meanings.definition: A tree of the myrtle family, native to Australia and having smooth bark and leaves that are often sticky when crushed.
meanings.sent1: The gumtree in the park provides shade on sunny days.
meanings.sent2: I love the fresh scent of a gumtree after the rain.
meanings.sent3: The sticky leaves of the gumtree made it a challenge to climb.
meanings.sent4: The gumtree stood tall like a guardian in the forest.
meanings.sent5: Under the gumtree, the children played happily.

meanings.definition: A website or app used for buying and selling items locally.
meanings.sent1: I found a great deal on a used bike on the gumtree website.
meanings.sent2: Many people prefer using gumtree to find unique items.
meanings.sent3: Selling my old couch on gumtree was easier than I thought.
meanings.sent4: She scrolled through the gumtree app looking for vintage clothes.
meanings.sent5: The gumtree platform connects buyers and sellers seamlessly.
